name: Daniel
info: I am 22 years old now with more than 2 years of Angular experience behind my back.
As you go down, you will see all you need to know about me within minutes.
about: As I code - I want to enjoy it, so the tools must be awesome and I choose the best.
Hence - Angular was chosen among all the others as the most powerful, scalable and reliable framework.
As an experienced developer, I had a few big products to work on, of which you may find interesting to read below.
